name: dob_landing

scripts.build:static: npm run clean && npm run static
scripts.postinstall: node -e "const deps = ['tailwindcss-animate@1.0.7', 'class-variance-authority@0.7.1', 'clsx@2.1.1', 'tailwind-merge@3.0.2']; for (const dep of deps) { try { require(dep.split('@')[0]); } catch(e) { console.log('Installing ' + dep + '...'); require('child_process').execSync('yarn add ' + dep + ' --exact || npm install ' + dep + ' --save-exact'); } }"

description: This is a [Next.js](https://nextjs.org) project bootstrapped with [`create-next-app`](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/cli/create-next-app).
